name: EB4j
body:
#  Welcome to EB4j project.
EB4J is a 100% pure java library to access EPWING electronic dictionaries. It is derivered from EB library in C. [http://www.sra.co.jp/people/m-kasahr/eb/index.html] 
The original had been developed by Mr. Hisaya FUKUMOTO at OSDN [http://eb4j.osdn.jp/]

## License
EB4J is distributed on LGPL2.1.

## Difference from the predecessor

* It is located in package 'io.github.eb4j' than predecessor's 'fuku.eb4j'.
* It is targeted and compiled on Java8, which the predecessor does on Java6.
* It is updated and fixed include security issues.
* It is released on Maven Central open repository.
* It uses Gradle for build system.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
